SKU.description: Foreign key to ITEMMASTER_TBL.SKU. Identifies the item being offered.

VENDORID.description: Foreign key to VENDOR_TBL.VENDORID. Identifies the vendor offering the item.

LEADTIME.description: Estimated number of days from order to delivery.

LASTPURCHASED.description: Date this item was last purchased from this vendor.

unavailableSince.description: Date this vendor stopped offering the item. Distinct from itemmaster.delistDate.
